nodes.text: B'Knos was an asteroid mining colony located within the Abran asteroid belt in the Abran system. The system was sometimes called the B'Knos system after this colony.

In 0 ABY it came under attack of the invasion force of the Ssi-ruuk. Presumable, all colonists were killed or enteched. Later, at 35:8:16, as part of the Imperial cover-up, it was reported that the supply ship Ambitious had crashed into the colony, due to unusual solar activity.
